class UV_PDS[source]

UV_PDS(fname) :: QUBE

Class: UV_PDS inherits from QUBE and is intended as a base class for FUV_PDS and EUV_PDS

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FUV_PDS[source]

FUV_PDS(fname) :: UV_PDS

Class: FUV_PDS defines an FUV QUBE object.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class EUV_PDS[source]

EUV_PDS(fname) :: UV_PDS

Class: UV_PDS inherits from QUBE and is intended as a base class for FUV_PDS and EUV_PDS

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class UVIS_NetCDF[source]

UVIS_NetCDF(fname, freq)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HSP[source]

HSP(fname, freq) :: UVIS_NetCDF

Class for reading NetCDF UVIS HSP data files.

Parameters

fname: {str, pathlib.Path} Path to file to read freq: str String indicating the sampling frequency, e.g. '1ms', '2ms'

Examples

hsp = hsp('path', '1ms')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FUV[source]

FUV(fname, freq='1s') :: UVIS_NetCDF

FUV NetCDF reader class.

Parameters

fname: str or pathlib.Path Path to file to read mode: {'stellar', 'solar'} Observation mode that controls the spectral binning freq: str String indicating the sampling frequency, e.g. '1s', '2s'

Examples

fuv = FUV('path', 'stellar', '1s')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
